name: Metron 2000 3-section Table
descr:
The Metron 2000 range of manipulation tables are the latest range from Metron. They have been designed of offer on economical alternative to existing range of treatment tables. The 2000 range however still offers you an execellent range of operating heights and uses the same high quality of European actuators (Linak). Importantly, unlike other economical tables, the 2000 range has double sided lifting arms which provides a firm, non-flexing liftning mechanism.

Specifications: 195x61x49-98 cm.
